text: ( Source : University of Arkansas ) Image courtesy of Vibeke Olson The University of Arkansas Department of Art is pleased to present an evening with Vibeke Olson. The lecture will be at 5:30 p.m. Thursday, Oct . 22 , at Hillside Auditorium ,
